org.pepstock.charba.client.intl

Class CLocaleBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.intl.CLocaleBuilder

  • public final class CLocaleBuilder
extends Object
    The builder is used to build instances of CLocale from values configured by the setters.
    A CLocale object created by a builder is well-formed and can be transformed to a well-formed IETF BCP 47 language and it's also cached.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  CLocaleBuilder.LocaleRegExpGroups
      This object is mapping the result of RegExpResult.groups(NativeObjectContainerFactory) in order to get the tokens of regexp result.
      private static class  CLocaleBuilder.LocaleRegExpGroupsFactory
      Internal native object factory to pass to RegExpResult.groups(NativeObjectContainerFactory) method in order to read the regular expression tokens, by the key set in the regular expression pattern.

      • applyRegExp

        private static CLocaleBuilder.LocaleRegExpGroups applyRegExp(String localeIdentifier)
        Parses the locale identifier by the regular expression.
        Returns null if the argument is not consistent as locale.
        Parameters:
        localeIdentifier - locale identifier to parse to get a locale.
        Returns:
        groups object, result of regular expression execution

      • createLocale

        private static CLocale createLocale(String identifier,
                                    Language language,
                                    Script script,
                                    Region region,
                                    String variantAndExtension)
        Creates a locale if not already created and cached, otherwise will return the cached one.
        Parameters:
        identifier - locale identifier, it's a unique key here.
        language - language instance needed to define a locale
        script - script instance needed to define a locale
        region - region instance needed to define a locale
        variantAndExtension - variant and extension part needed to define a locale
        Returns:
        a locale instance

      • createLocaleIdentifier

        private static String createLocaleIdentifier(Language language,
                                             Script script,
                                             Region region,
                                             String variantAndExtension)
        Creates the string identifier which is used for unique key of a locale and its locale value.
        The key for locale will have the following format:

        Language[-Script][-Region][-VariantAndExtension]
        Parameters:
        language - language instance needed to define a locale
        script - script instance needed to define a locale
        region - region instance needed to define a locale
        variantAndExtension - variant and extension part needed to define a locale
        Returns:
        the string identifier which is used for unique key of a locale and its locale value
